quizDescription: Test your knowledge about the Marvel Cinematic Universe and its iconic characters!

questions.question: Who is the main villain in 'The Avengers'?
questions.explanation: Loki is the main villain in 'The Avengers.'

questions.question: What is the name of Tony Stark's father?
questions.explanation: Tony Stark's father's name is Howard.

questions.question: What is the name of the group of intergalactic criminals that includes Gamora, Drax, and Groot?
questions.explanation: The group that includes Gamora, Drax, and Groot is called The Guardians of the Galaxy.

questions.question: Who is the director of S.H.I.E.L.D. in the Marvel Cinematic Universe?
questions.explanation: Nick Fury is the director of S.H.I.E.L.D. in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

questions.question: What is the name of the villainous organization that opposes S.H.I.E.L.D. in the Marvel Cinematic Universe?
questions.explanation: HYDRA is the villainous organization that opposes S.H.I.E.L.D. in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

questions.question: Which Avenger is known for wielding a mighty hammer called Mjolnir?
questions.explanation: Thor, the God of Thunder, is known for wielding the mighty hammer called Mjolnir.

questions.question: Which superhero can shrink to the size of an ant and communicate with ants?
questions.explanation: Ant-Man can shrink to the size of an ant and communicate with ants, thanks to his suit and Pym Particles.

questions.question: Who is the master of the mystic arts and the Sorcerer Supreme?
questions.explanation: Doctor Strange is the master of the mystic arts and holds the title of the Sorcerer Supreme.

questions.question: Which Infinity Stone is embedded in Vision's forehead?
questions.explanation: The Mind Stone is embedded in Vision's forehead, granting him various powers and abilities.

questions.question: Who is the green-skinned rage-filled superhero and a member of the Avengers?
questions.explanation: Hulk is the green-skinned, rage-filled superhero and a member of the Avengers, possessing incredible strength.

questions.question: Which superhero is also known as Natasha Romanoff and is a former Russian spy?
questions.explanation: Black Widow, also known as Natasha Romanoff, is a former Russian spy and a skilled assassin.

questions.question: Who is the tech genius and billionaire who becomes Iron Man?
questions.explanation: Tony Stark is the tech genius and billionaire who becomes Iron Man, using his suit to fight crime and protect the world.

questions.question: Which villain seeks to wipe out half of all life in the universe to bring balance?
questions.explanation: Thanos seeks to wipe out half of all life in the universe to bring what he perceives as balance, wielding the Infinity Gauntlet.

questions.question: Which superhero is the king and protector of Wakanda, a technologically advanced African nation?
questions.explanation: Black Panther is the king and protector of Wakanda, a technologically advanced African nation.

questions.question: Which alien race invaded Earth in the first 'Avengers' film?
questions.explanation: The Chitauri, a powerful alien race, invaded Earth in the first 'Avengers' film as part of Loki's plan.
